sn12.58:1.2: “Samyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assadanupassino viharato namarupassa avakkanti hoti.
sn12.58:2.2: Tassa yani ceva mulani adhogamani, yani ca tiriyangamani, sabbani tani uddham ojam abhiharanti.
sn12.58:2.3: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, maharukkho tadaharo tadupadano ciram dighamaddhanam tittheyya.
sn12.58:2.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, samyojaniyesu dhammesu assadanupassino viharato namarupassa avakkanti hoti …pe….
sn12.58:3.1: Samyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu adinavanupassino viharato namarupassa avakkanti na hoti.
sn12.58:4.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, samyojaniyesu dhammesu adinavanupassino viharato namarupassa avakkanti na hoti.
